898120.name: Temple of the Lost
898120.description:
You find yourself in ancient temple, but something is not right. You have lost your abilities. Explore the Temple of the Lost, find your lost abilities, solve occasional puzzles, avoid deadly traps, beat the mazes and find what's hidden. Slowly uncover the secrets of this temple, while listening to ambient, atmospheric music.


Temple of the Lost is atmospheric first-person exploration and puzzle solving game.



Features

Puzzle Solving - Solve puzzles to pass through blocked passages where treasures and lost abilities are.

Atmospheric Soundtrack - Atmosphere of the temple is amplified by ambient soundtrack.

Exploration - Explore huge temple, with lots of mysterious doors and chambers.
